original_text: It does not respect any other great animal. It rules as king over all the proud animals.’ It does not respect any other great animal. It rules as king over all the proud animals.’ It does not respect any other great animal. It rules as king over all the proud animals.’ It does not respect any other great animal.
korean_text: 그것은 모든 높은 자를 내려다보며 모든 교만한 자들에게 군림하는 왕이니라

sentences.original_text: It does not respect any other great animal.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 다른 어떤 위대한 동물도 존중하지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: It rules as king over all the proud animals.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 모든 교만한 동물들 위에 왕으로 다스립니다.

sentences.original_text: It does not respect any other great animal.
